Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
for native users:
download https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.6.0.13-PBaaS-Cross-chain-Technology-Preview
use KMD native mode there 
let the chain sync
create a new lite wallet in that same agama (save seed) for VRSC coin
note the R address
open native mode again and send all KMD balance to the address

if the verus agama doesn't work for native mode, look for the install instructions for komodo-ocean qt wallet at https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/folders/29000055193

Author: mrlynch#5735
Content:
quick steps to move your funds from agama lite wallet
1. import agama seed in chameleon pay or magnum wallet
2. download verus agama and create new seed - get address
3. send funds from bad agama to new safe address via chameleon or magnum

these seem to be the quickest ways atm
please see pinned messages for more details
